proof.th: ⊢ sin (-x) = -(sin x)
⊢ sin (pi / 2 - (x + pi / 2)) = -(sin x)
⊢ cos (x + pi / 2) = -(sin x)
⊢ cos (x + pi / 2) = -(sin x)

proof.args: real_derivative_cos_compose, {f: λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2, x: x}
proof.th: ⊢ real_differentiable (λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2) (atreal x) ⟶ real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) x = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2)) * real_derivative (λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2) x
⊢ real_differentiable (λx1. x1) (atreal x)

proof.args: real_differentiable_const, {c: of_nat n * pi / 2, net: atreal x}
proof.th: ⊢ real_differentiable (λx1. of_nat n * pi / 2) (atreal x)
⊢ real_differentiable (λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2) (atreal x)
⊢ real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) x = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2)) * real_derivative (λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2) x
⊢ real_derivative (λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2) x = real_derivative (λx1. x1) x + real_derivative (λx1. of_nat n * pi / 2) x
⊢ real_derivative (λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2) x = 1 + real_derivative (λx1. of_nat n * pi / 2) x
⊢ real_derivative (λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2) x = 1 + 0
⊢ real_derivative (λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2) x = 1
⊢ real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) x = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2)) * 1
⊢ real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) x = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))

proof.args: cos_pi_2, cos (x + of_nat n * pi / 2 + pi / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))
proof.th: ⊢ cos (x + of_nat n * pi / 2 + pi / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))

proof.args: real_add_assoc, cos (x + (of_nat n * pi / 2 + pi / 2)) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))
proof.th: ⊢ cos (x + (of_nat n * pi / 2 + pi / 2)) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))

proof.args: real_divide_def, cos (x + (of_nat n * pi * real_inverse 2 + pi * real_inverse 2)) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi * real_inverse 2))
proof.th: ⊢ cos (x + (of_nat n * pi * real_inverse 2 + pi * real_inverse 2)) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi * real_inverse 2))

proof.args: real_add_rdistrib, cos (x + (of_nat n * pi + pi) * real_inverse 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi * real_inverse 2))
proof.th: ⊢ cos (x + (of_nat n * pi + pi) * real_inverse 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi * real_inverse 2))

proof.args: real_divide_def, cos (x + (of_nat n * pi + pi) / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))
proof.th: ⊢ cos (x + (of_nat n * pi + pi) / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))

proof.args: real_mul_lid, cos (x + (of_nat n * pi + 1 * pi) / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))
proof.th: ⊢ cos (x + (of_nat n * pi + 1 * pi) / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))

proof.args: real_add_rdistrib, cos (x + (of_nat n + 1) * pi / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))
proof.th: ⊢ cos (x + (of_nat n + 1) * pi / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))

proof.args: real_one_def, cos (x + (of_nat n + of_nat 1) * pi / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))
proof.th: ⊢ cos (x + (of_nat n + of_nat 1) * pi / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))

proof.args: real_of_nat_add, cos (x + of_nat (n + 1) * pi / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))
proof.th: ⊢ cos (x + of_nat (n + 1) * pi / 2) = -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))
⊢ -(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2)) = real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) x

proof.args: has_real_derivative_differentiable, {f: λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2), x: x}
proof.th: ⊢ has_real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) (real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) x) (atreal x) ⟷ real_differentiable (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) (atreal x)
⊢ real_differentiable cos (atreal (x + of_nat n * pi / 2)) ⟶ real_differentiable (cos ∘ (λx1. x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) (atreal x)
⊢ real_differentiable cos (atreal (x + of_nat n * pi / 2)) ⟶ real_differentiable (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) (atreal x)
⊢ real_differentiable cos (atreal (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))
⊢ real_differentiable (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) (atreal x)

proof.th: ⊢ has_real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat n * pi / 2)) (-(sin (x + of_nat n * pi / 2))) (atreal x)

proof.args: real_taylor, {B: (1::real), f: λi. λx. cos (x + of_nat i * pi / 2), n: n, s: (univ::real set)}
proof.th: ⊢ is_realinterval univ ⟶ (∀i. ∀x. x ∈ univ ⟶ i ≤ n ⟶ has_real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat i * pi / 2)) (cos (x + of_nat (i + 1) * pi / 2)) (within (atreal x) univ)) ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (x + of_nat (n + 1) * pi / 2)) ≤ 1) ⟶ (∀w. ∀z. w ∈ univ ⟶ z ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (z + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (w + of_nat i * pi / 2) * (z - w) ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs (z - w) ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1)))
⊢ is_realinterval univ

⊢ (∀i. ∀x. x ∈ univ ⟶ i ≤ n ⟶ has_real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat i * pi / 2)) (cos (x + of_nat (i + 1) * pi / 2)) (within (atreal x) univ)) ⟶ (∀x. x ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (x + of_nat (n + 1) * pi / 2)) ≤ 1) ⟶ (∀w. ∀z. w ∈ univ ⟶ z ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (z + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (w + of_nat i * pi / 2) * (z - w) ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs (z - w) ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1)))
⊢ ∀i. ∀x. x ∈ univ ⟶ i ≤ n ⟶ has_real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat i * pi / 2)) (cos (x + of_nat (i + 1) * pi / 2)) (within (atreal x) univ)
⊢ _VAR i
⊢ _VAR y
y ∈ univ ⊢ y ∈ univ
i ≤ n ⊢ i ≤ n
⊢ has_real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat i * pi / 2)) (cos (y + of_nat (i + 1) * pi / 2)) (atreal y)

proof.args: withinreal_univ, has_real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat i * pi / 2)) (cos (y + of_nat (i + 1) * pi / 2)) (within (atreal y) univ)
proof.th: i ≤ n, y ∈ univ ⊢ has_real_derivative (λx1. cos (x1 + of_nat i * pi / 2)) (cos (y + of_nat (i + 1) * pi / 2)) (within (atreal y) univ)

⊢ (∀x. x ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (x + of_nat (n + 1) * pi / 2)) ≤ 1) ⟶ (∀w. ∀z. w ∈ univ ⟶ z ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (z + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (w + of_nat i * pi / 2) * (z - w) ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs (z - w) ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1)))
⊢ ∀x. x ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (x + of_nat (n + 1) * pi / 2)) ≤ 1
⊢ _VAR y
y ∈ univ ⊢ y ∈ univ
⊢ abs (cos (y + of_nat (n + 1) * pi / 2)) ≤ 1
⊢ ∀y. y ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (y + of_nat (n + 1) * pi / 2)) ≤ 1
⊢ ∀w. ∀z. w ∈ univ ⟶ z ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (z + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (w + of_nat i * pi / 2) * (z - w) ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs (z - w) ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1))

⊢ ∀z. (0::real) ∈ univ ⟶ z ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (z + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (0 + of_nat i * pi / 2) * (z - 0) ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs (z - 0) ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1))
⊢ (0::real) ∈ univ ⟶ x ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (x + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (0 + of_nat i * pi / 2) * (x - 0) ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs (x - 0) ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1))
⊢ (0::real) ∈ univ
⊢ x ∈ univ ⟶ abs (cos (x + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (0 + of_nat i * pi / 2) * (x - 0) ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs (x - 0) ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1))
⊢ x ∈ univ
⊢ abs (cos (x + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (0 + of_nat i * pi / 2) * (x - 0) ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs (x - 0) ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1))
⊢ abs (cos (x + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (0 + of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs x ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1))
⊢ abs (cos (x + of_nat 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs x ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1))
⊢ abs (cos (x + 0 * pi / 2) - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs x ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1))
⊢ abs (cos x - sum ({0..n}) (λi. cos (of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i))) ≤ 1 * abs x ^ (n + 1) / of_nat (fact (n + 1))
⊢ ∀i. cos (of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) = (if even i then -1 ^ (i DIV 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) else 0)
⊢ _VAR i
⊢ even i ⟶ cos (of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) = (if even i then -1 ^ (i DIV 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) else 0)
even i ⊢ even i
even i ⊢ ∃m. i = 2 * m
⊢ _VAR m
even i, i = 2 * m ⊢ 2 * m DIV 2 = m

proof.args: of_nat (2 * m) * pi / 2 = of_nat m * pi
proof.th: ⊢ of_nat (2 * m) * pi / 2 = of_nat m * pi

proof.args: cos (of_nat (2 * m) * pi / 2) * x ^ (2 * m) / of_nat (fact (2 * m)) = -1 ^ (2 * m DIV 2) * x ^ (2 * m) / of_nat (fact (2 * m))
proof.th: even i, i = 2 * m ⊢ cos (of_nat (2 * m) * pi / 2) * x ^ (2 * m) / of_nat (fact (2 * m)) = -1 ^ (2 * m DIV 2) * x ^ (2 * m) / of_nat (fact (2 * m))

proof.args: cos (of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) = -1 ^ (i DIV 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i)

proof.th: even i, i = 2 * m ⊢ cos (of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) = (if even i then -1 ^ (i DIV 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) else 0)
⊢ even i ⟶ cos (of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) = (if even i then -1 ^ (i DIV 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) else 0)
⊢ ¬(even i) ⟶ cos (of_nat i * pi / 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) = (if even i then -1 ^ (i DIV 2) * x ^ i / of_nat (fact i) else 0)
¬(even i) ⊢ ¬(even i)
⊢ of_nat i * pi / 2 = of_nat i * (pi / 2)
¬(even i) ⊢ ¬(even i) ∧ of_nat i * pi / 2 = of_nat i * (pi / 2)

⊢ abs (cos x - sum ({0..n}) (λi. (if even (2 * i) then -1 ^ (2 * i DIV 2) * x ^ (2 * i) / of_nat (fact (2 * i)) else 0) + (if even (2 * i + 1) then -1 ^ ((2 * i + 1) DIV 2) * x ^ (2 * i + 1) / of_nat (fact (2 * i + 1)) else 0))) ≤ abs x ^ (2 * n + 1 + 1) / of_nat (fact (2 * n + 1 + 1))

⊢ ∀i. (if even (2 * i) then -1 ^ (2 * i DIV 2) * x ^ (2 * i) / of_nat (fact (2 * i)) else 0) + (if even (2 * i + 1) then -1 ^ ((2 * i + 1) DIV 2) * x ^ (2 * i + 1) / of_nat (fact (2 * i + 1)) else 0) = -1 ^ i / of_nat (fact (2 * i)) * x ^ (2 * i)

⊢ even (2 * i)

⊢ 2 * i DIV 2 = i

proof.th: ⊢ (if even (2 * i) then -1 ^ (2 * i DIV 2) * x ^ (2 * i) / of_nat (fact (2 * i)) else 0) + (if even (2 * i + 1) then -1 ^ ((2 * i + 1) DIV 2) * x ^ (2 * i + 1) / of_nat (fact (2 * i + 1)) else 0) = -1 ^ i / of_nat (fact (2 * i)) * x ^ (2 * i)
